signalGreen

Class GisAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • signalGreen.GisAgent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoordinateAgent, Junction, LaneAgent, Light, Road, Vehicle

    public abstract class GisAgent
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic GIS agent. Every GIS agent should extend this class.
